title: Karlie Kloss shows off her toned abs in fun polka dot look during her trip to Madrid
text:
She made a career on the catwalk.

And Karlie Kloss showed off her fashion prowess in sassy new outfit selfie from her trip to Madrid.

The wife of Josh Kushner, 27, added a punny caption, writing: 'Jet lag has me seeing spots.'

Dot's the ticket! Karlie Kloss was simply stunning in a new Instagram

Karlie was radiant in the polka dot look, which teamed a flirty off-the-shoulder number with a full maxi skirt.

Pointy black heels barely peeped out from the bottom of her skirt.

She accessorized simply, adding hoop earrings.

Cheers! Another new snap showed Klossie - as fans love to call her - sitting in the front of a fancy car and holding out a glass of red wine to toast

Looking fresh for fall, Karlie showed off her sleek new bob as she put her hands on her hips with attitude.

Another new snap showed Klossie - as fans love to call her - sitting in the front of a fancy car and holding out a glass of red wine to toast.

'Cheers to the weekend,' she captioned the post.

Newlyweds: Karlie Kloss, 27, and Joshua Kushner, 34, wed in October of 2018 after a 3-month engagement and six years of dating (pictured here in New York on May 6)

Karlie's European getaway comes just after the star listed her two-bedroom NYC bachelorette pad for a clean $2.75million.

Kloss is finally ready to get rid of the Manhattan apartment one year after wedding venture capitalist Kushner. The pair married after a 3-month engagement and six years of dating.

The home, listed by Nick Gavin of Compass, is half a block away from the Hudson River Promenade.
description: The wife of Josh Kushner, 27, added a punny caption, writing: 'Jet lag has me seeing spots.' Karlie was radiant in the off-the-shoulder polka dot top with a full maxi skirt in matching spots.
